name: Vocera
headline: Testing & Observability for AI voice agents
description:
Are you building AI voice agents like receptionists, customer support, or sales reps? Do you find yourself manually testing your bot by calling it? We faced similar challenges, especially being in a regulated industry. That's why we developed Vocera - a solution that automates the testing process for your voice agents. With Vocera, you can prove your reliability before going live, test every update seamlessly, and scale your operations efficiently.

Replicating a real world conversation is hard. Our AI simulates these scenarios using workflows, personas and past conversations.

We are already talking to AI for ordering food, getting appointments and even interviews. The market is aptly getting flooded with AI voice agents built by thousands of companies. We make them dependable.

founders.name: Tarush Agarwal, Founder
founders.description:
Tarush is the Co-founder and CEO @ Vocera. 

Before this, Tarush spent 3 years in quant finance where he developed ultra low latency systems (think nanoseconds) and helped transform a loss making trading strategy into a successful desk doing millions in MRR in 3 months. 

He studied computer science and statistics at IIT Bombay.

founders.name: Shashij Gupta, Founder
founders.description:
Shashij is the Co-Founder & CTO @ Vocera.

Previously Shashij worked as a quantitative researcher in a trading firm searching for complex alphas. Shashij has also researched in NLP at Google Research and has a first author paper on testing transformers with 50+ citations from his work at ETH Zurich. 

He has also studied computer science at IIT Bombay.

founders.name: Sidhant Kabra, Founder
founders.description:
Sidhant is the Co-Founder & CBO @ Vocera. 

Sidhant comes from a consulting background advising CEOs at Fortune 500 companies in FMCG and medical devices. He also led a 100+ member team handling customer experience. Recently he drove product and growth at an edtech startup scaling from 0 to 170K+ users in 6 months. 

Sidhant completed his bachelor’s from IIT Bombay. During university, he raised $500K in sponsorship deals for Asia’s largest student-led festival.

Parallel Calling
Actionable evaluation in minutes

## How Vocera Works
Test against AI generated and custom datasets. Use workflows, personas and real audio to create datasets and evaluate them on your own metrics

## Trusted by 50+ Conversational AI companies across the globe
Vocera has been instrumental in helping us monitor the quality of our AI voice agents in real time, ensuring that only the most critical alerts require our attention. Their team has worked closely with us to drive continuous improvements. They tailor metrics to our specific requirements and provide invaluable guidance on best-in-class performance for these systems. 
![Danial Afzal](https://www.vocera.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ftestimonials%2Fdanial.png&w=256&q=75)
![@Decoda Health](https://www.vocera.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ftestimonials%2Flogo%2Fdecoda.png&w=256&q=75)
Danial Afzal
CEO
@Decoda Health
Love the product. Additionally, if you face any issue the team is super responsive
![Skandere Sahli](https://www.vocera.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ftestimonials%2FSandra.png&w=256&q=75)
![@Sandra](https://www.vocera.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ftestimonials%2Flogo%2FSandra.png&w=256&q=75)
Skandere Sahli
CTO
@Sandra
Vocera has a become a critical part of our development pipeline, now we don't ship any agents to production without first aggressively testing them out on Vocera. The team replies to all messages within 5 minutes and will do whatever it takes to ensure your AI agents are ready for production
![Rishi Chowdhary](https://www.vocera.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ftestimonials%2Frishi.png&w=256&q=75)
![@Kastle](https://www.vocera.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ftestimonials%2Flogo%2Fkastle.png&w=256&q=75)
Rishi Chowdhary
CEO
@Kastle
Building agents took only a few hours anyway. It was testing that took us days because you cannot send anything half-baked in production in a compliance heavy industry like ours. Vocera tests all that and more efficiently.
![Sameer Fulzele](https://www.vocera.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ftestimonials%2Fsameer.png&w=256&q=75)
![@Rifa](https://www.vocera.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ftestimonials%2Flogo%2Frifa.png&w=256&q=75)
Sameer Fulzele
Co-founder
@Rifa
I love that Vocera suggests how to improve instead of making you figure it out yourself.
![Seb Hapte-Selassie](https://www.vocera.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ftestimonials%2Fseb.png&w=256&q=75)
![@Telli](https://www.vocera.ai/_next/image?url=%2Ftestimonials%2Flogo%2Ftelli.png&w=256&q=75)
Seb Hapte-Selassie
CTO
@Telli
Vocera has been a game-changer for optimizing our voice agent. Thanks to their product, we’ve slashed latency and boosted accuracy. Their platform is constantly evolving, and we love the direction it's heading in. The team is super responsive when it comes to support, and that has been a strong differentiator vs. their competition.

generated_description:
### Summary of Vocera

**Company Overview:**
Vocera, founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch F24, operates under a clear mission: to provide testing and observability for AI voice agents. Imagine you're developing a voice assistant—think digital receptionists or customer support bots. That’s where Vocera steps in, making the tedious process of testing these bots not just manageable, but efficient.

**The Problem They're Solving:**
In sectors where compliance and reliability are paramount, like health care or finance, manual testing can be a nightmare. Vocera recognizes this struggle, which is why they created a solution to automate testing. Users can validate the performance of their voice agents, ensuring they meet the required standards before going live. 

**How It Works:**
Vocera's platform simulates real-world conversations through various scenarios, using workflows, personas, and historical interactions. This helps developers pre-emptively identify and fix issues—whether it's a new prompt that breaks functionality or an impatient user disrupting communication. Essentially, this is about saving time and increasing confidence in the technology being deployed.

**What's Unique:**
With Vocera, you’re not just getting a testing tool; you’re accessing a platform that allows for real-time monitoring, trend analysis, and actionable insights. Imagine a dashboard that not only displays performance metrics but alerts you to potential failures before they affect users.

**Who They Serve:**
Vocera is versatile, working across industries including customer support, sales, legal, and healthcare. They’ve already gained traction, servicing over 50 conversational AI companies who trust them to ensure their voice agents work flawlessly.

**Current Status:**
The company has a lean team of three and is operating out of Sunnyvale, CA. They’re led by Nicolas Dessaigne as their group partner and are backed by Y Combinator—a strong signal of their potential in the tech landscape.

**Customer Testimonials:**
Users praise Vocera for its effectiveness and responsive support. CEOs and CTOs from various organizations highlight how they can now launch voice agents much faster, all while ensuring those agents are fine-tuned and ready for real-world scenarios.

If you’re building AI voice agents, particularly in a compliance-heavy industry, Vocera is positioned to significantly streamline your development process. 

**Connect with Vocera:**
For more details, check their website at [Vocera](https://www.vocera.ai/). 

So if you’re tired of wasting time manually testing your bots, Vocera could just be the solution you’ve been looking for.
